des: "This recipe has been a constant for over 30 years. It is quick easy and always turns out.  Enjoy!"
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine evaporated milk, sugar and salt.  Bring to a boil, then remove from heat and stir in marshmallows, chocolate chips, vanilla and nuts until marshmallows are melted.  Pour into an 8x8 inch dish.  Let cool completely before cutting into squares.
